channel.title: CVE Feed for ClusterLabs -- pacemaker
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ClusterLabs -- pacemaker

item.title: CVE-2018-16878|2024-08-05T10:32:54.240Z -- clusterlabs -- pacemaker
item.description: A flaw was found in pacemaker up to and including version 2.0.1. An insufficient verification inflicted preference of uncontrolled processes can lead to DoS

item.title: CVE-2018-16877|2024-08-05T10:32:54.207Z -- clusterlabs -- pacemaker
item.description: A flaw was found in the way pacemaker's client-server authentication was implemented in versions up to and including 2.0.0. A local attacker could use this flaw, and combine it with other IPC weaknesses, to achieve local privilege escalation.
